## AUDIT vs ASSIST

The field of psychology often involves the use of questionnaires to gauge certain behaviors or tendencies. Two such questionnaires that are frequently used are the AUDIT (Alcohol Use Disorders Identification Test) and the ASSIST (Alcohol, Smoking, and Substance Involvement Screening Test). However, the process of comparing individual items in these questionnaires, commonly referred to as harmonisation, can be tedious and time-consuming.


## Compare the items in AUDIT and ASSIST

* <a href="https://harmonydata.ac.uk/app/#_In0sIHsicXVlc3Rpb25fdGV4dCI6ICJIb3cgb2Z0ZW4gZHVyaW5nIHRoZSBwYXN0IHllYXIgaGF2ZSB5b3U6In0sIHsicXVlc3Rpb25fdGV4dCI6ICJGb3VuZCB0aGF0IHlvdSB3ZXJlIG5vdCBhYmxlIHRvIHN0b3AgZHJpbmtpbmcgb25jZSB5b3UgaGFkIHN0YXJ0ZWQ_In0sIHsicXVlc3Rpb25fdGV4dCI6ICJGYWlsZWQgdG8gZG8gd2hhdCB3YXMgbm9ybWFsbHkgZXhwZWN0ZWQgb2YgeW91IGJlY2F1c2Ugb2YgZHJpbmtpbmc__In1dfV0=" target="harmonyapp">Import AUDIT and ASSIST into Harmony and harmonise them</a> - find similarities between the two instruments using our AI platform
* <a href="https://harmonydata.ac.uk/app/#_In0sIHsicXVlc3Rpb25fdGV4dCI6ICJIb3cgb2Z0ZW4gZHVyaW5nIHRoZSBwYXN0IHllYXIgaGF2ZSB5b3U6In0sIHsicXVlc3Rpb25fdGV4dCI6ICJGb3VuZCB0aGF0IHlvdSB3ZXJlIG5vdCBhYmxlIHRvIHN0b3AgZHJpbmtpbmcgb25jZSB5b3UgaGFkIHN0YXJ0ZWQ_In0sIHsicXVlc3Rpb25fdGV4dCI6ICJGYWlsZWQgdG8gZG8gd2hhdCB3YXMgbm9ybWFsbHkgZXhwZWN0ZWQgb2YgeW91IGJlY2F1c2Ugb2YgZHJpbmtpbmc__In1dfV0=" target="harmonyapp">Import just AUDIT into Harmony</a> - compare AUDIT with other instruments
* <a href="https://harmonydata.ac.uk/app/#_In0sIHsicXVlc3Rpb25fdGV4dCI6ICJIb3cgb2Z0ZW4gZHVyaW5nIHRoZSBwYXN0IHllYXIgaGF2ZSB5b3U6In0sIHsicXVlc3Rpb25fdGV4dCI6ICJGb3VuZCB0aGF0IHlvdSB3ZXJlIG5vdCBhYmxlIHRvIHN0b3AgZHJpbmtpbmcgb25jZSB5b3UgaGFkIHN0YXJ0ZWQ_In0sIHsicXVlc3Rpb25fdGV4dCI6ICJGYWlsZWQgdG8gZG8gd2hhdCB3YXMgbm9ybWFsbHkgZXhwZWN0ZWQgb2YgeW91IGJlY2F1c2Ugb2YgZHJpbmtpbmc__In1dfV0=" target="harmonyapp">Import just ASSIST into Harmony</a> - compare ASSIST with other instruments

Moreover, the analyses often have to be repeated across multiple studies to ensure consistency. This is where the Harmony software comes in, offering an efficient solution for the comparison of AUDIT vs ASSIST. Harmony significantly simplifies the process by leveraging advanced AI technologies. Through the use of natural language processing and generative AI models, Harmony can effectively compare items in AUDIT and ASSIST, even if they are in different languages.

This not only eliminates the manual labour involved but also reduces the chances of error that come with subjectivity. The software offers a user-friendly interface where you can either choose from already available instruments, or upload your own in PDF format. Here's an invitation for all psychologists or social scientists out there- step into the future of research with Harmony. By utilising Harmony in your studies, it will be much easier for you to evaluate AUDIT vs ASSIST, enabling you to focus on drawing meaningful insights from your research rather than being bogged down with data harmonisation. Through Harmony's effective approach, AUDIT vs ASSIST comparison need no longer be an arduous process, but an exciting and enlightening task.
